item.title: Work
item.description: I used to create software. Now I am selling it. Skills Business-wise Account Expansion Demand Generation Technology-wise Account Expansion Demand Generation I can help you with Business-wise Account Expansion Demand Generation Technology-wise Account Expansion Demand Generation -- Work Experience SpotMe Customer Success Manager Feb 2021 till now — Lausanne, Switzerland Account Executive Jul 2020 till Feb 2021 — Lausanne, Switzerland Sales Development Rep Dec 2019 till Jul 2020 — Lausanne, Switzerland Customer Success Manager at SpotMe Feb 2021 till now — Lausanne, Switzerland Account Executive at SpotMe Jul 2020 till Feb 2021 — Lausanne, Switzerland Sales Development Rep at SpotMe Dec 2019 till Jul 2020 — Lausanne, Switzerland -- Product Designer at Price f(x) May 2017 till Jan 2019 – Prague, Czech Republic Increased sales at various enterprises through dynamic pricing.

item.title: Sharing
item.description: Follow along LinkedIn Work related content together with my resume. Facebook Life updates and insights. Instagram Travels. Twitter Tech related content. Startups and web development. YouTube Travel vlogs and interviews. Medium Long-read stories. Dribbble Design projects. Github Code projects. Writing Life Stories Dec 2019 Today is My Sister’s Second Birthday Since She Died Jun 2017

item.title: Side Projects
item.description: I am driven by improving things around me. Take Me as an Intern Jun 2016 — Oct 2016 During the 4 months gap between graduating high school and starting of university I wanted to be an intern so I made one-page site describing my skills and how can I contribute to the business. The site made it as #1 on YC Hacker News. Had over 30k visitors in one night and get huge media attention all around the world.

item.title: Education Awards
item.description: Education The Story High-quality technical education abroad has been my aim for a long time, which is why I left my home country after graduating from the best tech high school in Slovakia (according to the INEKO ranking). Followed by applying for the Ivy League universities. The University of Cambridge, according to rankings, the 4th best university in the world, invited me for interviews where I exceeded their expectations in Computer Science but didn't persuade them with my math skills.
